mapper.select: select bm.book_code,b.book_name,b.book_author,bm.rent_date,bm.return_date,bm.id,bm.reserve_date from book b, book_management bm where b.book_code = bm.book_code and bm.reserve_date is null and bm.id=#{id}
select bm.book_code,b.book_name,b.book_author,bm.reserve_date,bm.id,bm.rent_date from book b, book_management bm where b.book_code = bm.book_code and bm.id=#{id} and rent_date is null
SELECT CEIL(count(*)/5) FROM book_management bm,book b WHERE bm.book_code=b.book_code AND id=#{id} AND b.rent_yn='y' AND sysdate BETWEEN rent_date AND return_date
SELECT count(*) FROM book_management bm, book b WHERE bm.book_code=b.book_code AND id=#{id} AND b.rent_yn='y' AND sysdate BETWEEN rent_date AND return_date

SELECT bm.book_code,b.book_name,b.book_author,bm.rent_date,bm.return_date,bm.id,num FROM (SELECT book_management_code,id,book_code,rent_date,return_date,rownum as num FROM (SELECT book_management_code,id,book_code,rent_date,return_date FROM book_management WHERE id=#{id} AND reserve_date is null AND sysdate BETWEEN rent_date AND return_date ORDER BY book_management_code desc)) bm, book b WHERE b.book_code = bm.book_code AND num between #{start} and #{end} AND b.rent_yn='y'
